Daniel Kashnitsky

Public Health & Migration Expert • PhD in Sociology & Demography

Public health and migration expert with 15+ years' experience bridging academic research, international advocacy, and policy change across Eastern Europe, Central Asia, and the EU. PhD in Sociology & Demography (Sorbonne). Proven track record in leading multi-country projects on HIV, TB, and health equity for migrant populations and vulnerable communities. Expert adviser to WHO, UN agencies, and EU bodies. Recognized for building cross-sector coalitions and translating evidence into impactful policy solutions.
